An Animal Defenders International Rescue Team has traveled to Zimbabwe and secured a CITES confiscation order from the Ministry of Agriculture for four tigers, six lions, and an African Python from Assan Circus. Ten dogs and two horses were also seized on welfare grounds. These animals were handed into the care of Animal Defenders International who are currently seeking new homes. A. Hassan, owner of the circus, has apparently fled the country and cannot be located.
If you have any information about Mr. Hassan or the circus, please contact Animal Defenders International.
